meanings.definition: To remove a bonnet or hat from one's head.
meanings.sent1: She was unbonneting her hat before entering the house.
meanings.sent2: Every evening, he unbonnets his cap as a sign of respect.
meanings.sent3: The magician unbonneted a rabbit from his hat instead of a dove!
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the sky seemed to unbonnet its golden crown.
meanings.sent5: The wind unbonneted the scarecrow, sending its hat flying across the field.

meanings.definition: The act of taking off a bonnet or hat.
meanings.sent1: Her unbonneting was graceful and elegant.
meanings.sent2: The unbonneting of the bride revealed her beautiful hairstyle.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the actor's unbonneting caused laughter in the audience.
meanings.sent4: The unbonneting of the old oak tree in autumn was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The unbonneting of the statue symbolized freedom and liberation.
